title: Vaccines: from lab to baby
description: Learn how childhood vaccines are developed, tested and monitored for safety.
sitename: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
cleaned_text: Infant and Childhood Immunization Resources These resources provide information to better help you understand vaccines for infants and children. Easy-to Read Immunization Schedules Create a Personalized Vaccine Schedule [Answer a few questions](https://www2a.cdc.gov/vaccines/childquiz/) about your child's health history to create a personalized list of recommended vaccines. You can print the results and review them with your child's doctor. Also view this vaccine assessment tool in [Spanish](https://www2.cdc.gov/vaccines/childquiz/default-sp.asp). What should parents expect after their child's vaccine visit? Find out how baby Jack's mom and dad comfort him after a checkup where he was vaccinated, part of [#HowVaccinesWork](https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%23HowVaccinesWork). [How do vaccines help babies fight infections?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k7DGeWlKu0Q&list=PLvrp9iOILTQbWnCdkVOZiv9KURxNc3rPo&index=3) How do vaccines work with your child's immune system to fight infections? Join baby Jack and his parents as they find out how vaccines help train your baby's immune system to help prevent disease in this How Vaccines Work video. [What to expect when your child is vaccinated.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0voOSqFeqCk&list=PLvrp9iOILTQbWnCdkVOZiv9KURxNc3rPo&index=3) What should parents expect after their child's vaccine visit? Find out how baby Jack's mom and dad comfort him after a checkup where he received vaccines in this How Vaccines Work video. [Measles: More than just a little rash](/vaccines/parents/diseases/child/vpd-infographics/measles.html) This infographic details the symptoms of measles, how it is spread, and how it can be prevented - the MMR vaccine. Learn more about this serious disease. [Mumps: More than just swollen glands](/vaccines/parents/diseases/child/vpd-infographics/mumps.html) This infographic details the symptoms of mumps, how it is spread, and how it can be prevented - the MMR vaccine. Learn more about this serious disease. [Whooping Cough: More than just a cough](/vaccines/parents/diseases/child/vpd-infographics/whooping-cough.html) This infographic details the symptoms of whooping cough (pertussis), how it is spread, and how to help prevent it in children — the DTaP vaccine. Learn more about this serious disease. [Journey of Your Child's Vaccine](/vaccines/parents/infographics/journey-of-child-vaccine.html) This infographic provides an overview of how new vaccines are developed, approved, and manufactured, how they are added to the United States' childhood immunization schedule, and how vaccine safety continues to be monitored after introduction. [How Vaccines Strengthen Your Baby's Immune System](/vaccines/parents/infographics/strengthen-baby-immune-system.html) This infographic describes how vaccines help your baby's immune system to recognize and fight serious diseases. See [Spanish version](/vaccines/parents/infographics/strengthen-baby-immune-system-sp.html). Public Service Announcements (PSAs) Radio To listen to a PSA, click on the link. To download an audio file, right click link and select "Save Target As...". If you experience difficulties downloading an audio file, please [contact us](mailto:ncirdwebteam@cdc.gov).
